Table of Contents

Interface IOpmlService

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Services
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Service interface for importing and exporting RSS feeds in OPML format. OPML (Outline Processor Markup Language) is the standard format for RSS feed lists exchange between applications.

public interface IOpmlService

Remarks

This service provides comprehensive OPML import/export functionality with the following features:

  • Import feeds from OPML files with automatic category creation
  • Export feeds to OPML format with optional category structure preservation
  • Validation of OPML files before import to prevent corruption
  • Statistics tracking for monitoring import/export operations
  • Support for both streams and file paths for flexible integration

All methods return DTOs instead of entities to maintain separation of concerns.

Methods

ExportAsync(bool, bool, CancellationToken)

Exports all feeds to OPML format.

Task<string> ExportAsync(bool includeCategories = true, bool includeInactive = false, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

includeCategories bool

Whether to include category structure in the OPML outline. Default: true.

includeInactive bool

Whether to include inactive feeds in the export. Default: false.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<string>

OPML document as a string.

Exceptions

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

ExportCategoriesAsync(IEnumerable<int>, CancellationToken)

Exports specific categories to OPML format.

Task<string> ExportCategoriesAsync(IEnumerable<int> categoryIds, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

categoryIds IEnumerable<int>

IDs of categories to export.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<string>

OPML document as a string containing only feeds from the specified categories.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if categoryIds is null.

ArgumentException

Thrown if categoryIds is empty.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

ExportToFileAsync(string, bool, bool, CancellationToken)

Exports feeds to an OPML file.

Task ExportToFileAsync(string filePath, bool includeCategories = true, bool includeInactive = false, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

filePath string

Path where to save the OPML file.

includeCategories bool

Whether to include category structure. Default: true.

includeInactive bool

Whether to include inactive feeds. Default: false.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if filePath is null or whitespace.

UnauthorizedAccessException

Thrown if write access to the directory is denied.

DirectoryNotFoundException

Thrown if the directory path doesn't exist.

IOException

Thrown if an I/O error occurs while creating the file.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

Gets statistics about OPML import/export operations.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

An OpmlStatisticsDto object containing operation metrics.

Exceptions

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

ImportAsync(Stream, string, bool, CancellationToken)

Imports feeds from an OPML file stream.

Task<OpmlImportResultDto> ImportAsync(Stream opmlStream, string defaultCategory = "Imported", bool overwriteExisting = false, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

opmlStream Stream

Stream containing OPML data.

defaultCategory string

Default category for uncategorized feeds. Default: "Imported".

overwriteExisting bool

Whether to overwrite existing feeds with same URL. Default: false.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<OpmlImportResultDto>

An OpmlImportResultDto containing import statistics and details.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if opmlStream is null.

ArgumentException

Thrown if defaultCategory is null or whitespace.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if the OPML format is invalid or cannot be parsed.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

ImportFromFileAsync(string, string, bool, CancellationToken)

Imports feeds from an OPML file.

Task<OpmlImportResultDto> ImportFromFileAsync(string filePath, string defaultCategory = "Imported", bool overwriteExisting = false, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

filePath string

Path to the OPML file.

defaultCategory string

Default category for uncategorized feeds. Default: "Imported".

overwriteExisting bool

Whether to overwrite existing feeds with same URL. Default: false.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<OpmlImportResultDto>

An OpmlImportResultDto containing import statistics and details.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if filePath is null or whitespace.

FileNotFoundException

Thrown if the specified file does not exist.

UnauthorizedAccessException

Thrown if read access to the file is denied.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if the OPML format is invalid or cannot be parsed.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

Stream containing OPML data.

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<OpmlValidationResultDto>

Exceptions

Thrown if opmlStream is null.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.
